misc:
2:38 long -> scenecon2k3 mch samples from kiarchive use ft2 or xmplayer!
nagzrm243@hotmail.com yes, i wanna do gamemusic.
this version still has some bugs but who cares? listenable. and worked on it a lot. ahem.
i've been impressed and inspired by... -DotT (by Lucasarts), -TIM (by Dynamix) -any cartoon.
some people mentioned that the ending part is like Simpsons' theme. well, the main melody and the transitions aren't the same at all. this piece is 100% my composition, believe me.
greetings to 4t xhale xerxes wegaz vhiiula cerror rigor mue kcg decibelter trx valz dodgingliquid ir generiq boyc sha zaq rc55 drax graff ETC..
enough
anyway, i'm off.
2003 Budapest Hungary
--------------------------------- An entry for SceneCon 2003 multichannel compo, ranked 2nd place.
